channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The same old set of potholes that have been there for months and joined up to make a trench, 22nd February
item.description:
Opposite park on ermin street
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 21st February
item.description:
This week it’s a black bag of rubbish, an assortment of general household waste and a shopping trolley. Why don’t you try and catch people who dump rubbish here EVERY WEEK??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Pates Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recently filled areas have opened up again along the stretch of the road, 21st February
item.description:
From the speed bumps to the roundabout there are various potholes reopened after the rain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Road, Cheltenham

item.title: The lane markings at this busy roundabout are not clearly defined. Work to rectify this needs to be done urgently. rly defined,, 21st February
item.description:
No lane markings are clearly defined.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Elmbridge, Gloucester

item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Fly tipping, 21st February
item.description:
There is a waste bin at the layby on Aggs hill adjacent to the reservoir. 2 long lengths of guttering have been dumped there ... I asked a 3 man team from UBICO ( why does it need 3 men to empty litter bins???)if they would take it away but they seemed unable to do so ... can you send out a suitable vehicle on a special one off trip to collect and dispose of this please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
